name: magento-extend-integration
description: this npm package is used to manage linting dependencies only

scripts.lint:all: yarn lint:all:js && yarn lint:all:php && yarn lint:all:xml
scripts.lint:diff:php: git diff --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB --name-only origin/master | grep -E "(.php$)" | xargs npx prettier --parser=php --check
scripts.lint:diff:xml: git diff --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB --name-only origin/master | grep -E "(.xml$)" | xargs npx prettier --parser=xml --check
scripts.lint: yarn lint:diff:js && yarn lint:diff:php && yarn lint:diff:xml
